feed.title: LinkAce Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for LinkAce: v1.14.0
entry.content:
Support for PHP 8.0 was dropped. LinkAce only supports PHP 8.1, 8.2 and 8.3.

  • Update for the Romanian translation.
  • Small Interface fixes.
  • Large-scale update of used dependencies.
  • Base Node version used in the project is not v20 LTS.

entry.title: New release for LinkAce: v1.14.1
entry.content:
• Translation fix and minor adjustment of the privacy icon by @ramsnerm. ðŸ¥³
  • Imports now properly work if exports do not contain creation dates. (#752)
  • Dependencies were updated.

entry.title: New release for LinkAce: v1.14.2
entry.content:
• Tags and lists are now properly added to links by their ID when then link is created via the API (#774)
  • Compatibility with Podman, update for the contribution docs by @chrissawyerfan4.
  • Dependencies were updated.

entry.title: New release for LinkAce: v1.15.0
entry.content:
• LinkAce is now available in Japanese, thanks to Crowdin user kazukisuzuki! ðŸ¥³
  • Browser cookies are secure by default now.
  • Dependencies were updated, including security patches.

entry.title: New release for LinkAce: v1.15.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Reduce release image size by @rare-magma in https://github.com/Kovah/LinkAce/pull/799
  • Dependencies were updated.

New Contributors

  • @rare-magma made their first contribution in https://github.com/Kovah/LinkAce/pull/799

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kovah/LinkAce/compare/v1.15.0...v1.15.1
